32.ara-name: كتاب القدر عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Jabir bin 'Abdullah narrated that the Messenger of Allah (s.a.w) said:'A slave (of Allah) shall not believe until he believes in Al-Qadar, its good and its bad, such that he knows that what struck him would not have missed him, and that what missed him would not have struck him

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الإِيمَانِ بِالْقَدَرِ خَيْرِهِ وَشَرِّهِ
